Lake Taupō jetski death: Vincent Cornell died saving his brother’s life https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/lake-taupo-jetski-death-vincent-cornell-died-while- saving-his-brothers-life/FBHNWZWPY5GR5OK5ZALVW33KGE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/lake-taupo-jetski-death-vincent-cornell-died-while- saving-his-brothers-life/FBHNWZWPY5GR5OK5ZALVW33KGE/ Police divers recovered the body of Vincent 'Vinnie' Cornell from Lake Taupō on Monday. Tue, 21 Jan 2025 01:15:51 +0000 Vincent "Vinnie" Cornell, who died on Sunday while saving his brother during a jetski incident at Acacia Bay, was “a pillar of strength and joy” for his family.
Auckland, Coromandel, Gisborne brace for heavy rain, strong winds as storm grips North Island https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-coromandel-gisborne-brace-for-heavy-rain-strong-winds-as-storm-grips-north-island/HOHQTZ3SYZABVKM5BMUUIQTS5A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-coromandel-gisborne-brace-for-heavy-rain-strong-winds-as-storm-grips-north-island/HOHQTZ3SYZABVKM5BMUUIQTS5A/ Rachel MaherStrong winds hit Auckland, with gusts reaching 93km/h on the harbour bridge. Mon, 20 Jan 2025 23:22:32 +0000 Aucklanders are warned of potential harbour bridge lane closures and strong winds, with gusts up to 100km/h. Photo / Dean Purcell

Exclusive: Serious harm cases in New Zealand maternity system include maternal deaths, C-section delay https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/exclusive-serious-harm-cases-in-new-zealand-maternity-system-include-maternal-deaths-c-section-delay/EM5SCYAYZZEJPCP27X44BLPEUY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/exclusive-serious-harm-cases-in-new-zealand-maternity-system-include-maternal-deaths-c-section-delay/EM5SCYAYZZEJPCP27X44BLPEUY/ Nicholas JonesThe Herald has obtained details of major harm and death events in the maternity system.
